mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, name, gender, provider, provider_id, role) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, provider = #{provider}, provider_id = #{providerId}, role = #{role} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
